title: Dynamic Re-tasking due to Weather
description: A planned air strike is aborted due to bad weather over the primary target. The strike package must be re-tasked to a secondary target.

tasks.description: Receive a weather alert indicating conditions at the primary target are below minimums for strike.
Retrieve the pre-planned secondary target information and check weather conditions at that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms the secondary target and finds clear weather conditions.

tasks.description: Transmit a re-tasking order to the strike package leader, directing them to proceed to the secondary target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully re-tasks the mission, preventing a wasted sortie.
